main.title: Heardle
main.volume: Turn up the volume and tap to start the track!
main.placeholder: Know it? Search for the artist / title

about.title: About
about.txt: Each daily Heardle features a clip from a popular song. Guess in as few tries as possible, and be sure to come back every day for a new song.
about.author: Made by Pedro H. Teles

like.title: Support
like.txt: If you enjoyed the game and would like to support me with the server costs to keep the game online, please consider donating!

howtoplay.title: How to Play
howtoplay.txt: Listen to the intro, then find the correct artist & title in the list.
howtoplay.txt2: Skipped or incorrect attempts unlock more of the intro.
howtoplay.txt3: Answer in as few tries as possible and share your score!

stats.title: Stats
stats.txt: The stats started counting from Heardle #8.
stats.subtitle: Your score distribution

phrases.firstTime: You got today's Heardle within 2 seconds.

phrases.fifthTime: You got today's Heardle within 14 seconds.
phrases.sixthTime: You got today's Heardle within 16 seconds.
